service.title: Service Description
service.description: Ten10 is a tithe management and financial budget system. The service includes:
service.item2: Management of income, expenses, and donations

dataAndPrivacy.title: Data, Privacy & Platform Differences
dataAndPrivacy.description: Ten10 has both a web version (cloud) and a desktop version (local). Data handling differs between them.
dataAndPrivacy.item1: Web: account data (e.g., email) and app data may be stored in our Supabase database
dataAndPrivacy.item2: Web: financial records you enter (transactions, recurring transactions) may be stored to provide the service
dataAndPrivacy.item3: Web: communication preferences (e.g., reminders, mailing consent) may be stored to respect your choices
dataAndPrivacy.item4: Support: if you contact us, we may store your message, attachments, and basic technical metadata (e.g., app version, locale, user-agent)
dataAndPrivacy.item5: Desktop: your financial data is stored locally on your device (SQLite) unless you choose to export/share it

thirdParties.item2: AWS SES (sending service emails such as reminders and download links)
